column5: Our newest edition to the Mother Nature Lure Collection is the Baby Sunfish. #10 colours to choose from. 3.5 inched long. Order now and receive a free antique style tin sign with order! Price is $30 each with free shipping! The Life Like Baby Sunfish lure is the perfect underwater swimbait for catching big Bass and Pike fish. Mother Nature's realistic colour patterns, details and life like swim action will take your fishing adventure to a whole new experience. check out mothernaturelures.ca
